items.sentence: Are you sure that Tom didn't suspect anything?

They all sipped their drinks at the same time.

What surprised me most was how long Tom slept.
This is the moment we've all been waiting for.
I'd like it if it wasn't so hot in the summer.
Did you watch a lot of TV when you were young?
Tom doesn't know how Mary was able to do that.
People cheered as Tom crossed the finish line.
Tom told me what Mary had told him to tell me.
Have you ever driven a four-wheel drive truck?
What time will we be leaving tomorrow morning?
I admit this may not be the best way to do it.
Tom was in Mary's car the last time I saw him.
We were glad to hear that Tom got back safely.
I can never tell if you are joking or serious.
I'm thinking of hiring a financial consultant.
I'm not thinking about anything in particular.
I'm going to install solar panels on my house.
I'm so glad I'm not living in the Middle Ages.
I'm going to miss having you around the house.

Let's get out of here before somebody sees us.

Tom was the one who told me we had to do that.
This is a community where hard work is valued.

This mountain is snow-covered the entire year.
Since the rain stopped, they resumed the game.
